content: Hi @Michele Mottini - how many of the US Argonaut implementations support stand-alone app s? Is that something you know about
As in apps that are not embedded in the EHR? All of the implementation I know of support that (Cerner, Epic, Allscripts, NextGen, Meditech, Centricity, eClinicalWorks)
wonderful. thanks. Follow up by email for a particular context :-)
